SEARCH
Package com.api.synco.infrastructure.exception

Class GlobalExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.api.synco.infrastructure.exception.GlobalExceptionHandler
@ControllerAdvice public class GlobalExceptionHandler extends Object
Global exception handler for the Synco API.

This class provides centralized exception handling across all controllers using Spring's ControllerAdvice mechanism. It transforms various exception types into standardized API error responses.

The handler manages:

  • Domain-specific exceptions (User, Course, Authentication)
  • Token-related exceptions
  • Data integrity violations
  • Generic runtime and checked exceptions
Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Luca5Eckert

    • handlerRuntimeException

      @ExceptionHandler(RuntimeException.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CustomApiResponse<?>> handlerRuntimeException(RuntimeException e, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest)
      Handles uncaught runtime exceptions.

      This is a fallback handler for any runtime exceptions that are not caught by more specific handlers. It returns a generic error message to avoid exposing internal details.

      Parameters:
      e - the runtime exception
      httpServletRequest - the HTTP request that triggered the exception
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the error response with HTTP 500 status

    • handler

      @ExceptionHandler(Exception.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CustomApiResponse<?>> handler(Exception e, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest)
      Handles generic checked exceptions.

      This is the most generic exception handler, catching any exception not handled by other handlers.

      Parameters:
      e - the exception
      httpServletRequest - the HTTP request that triggered the exception
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the error response with HTTP 400 status

    • handlerDataViolation

      @ExceptionHandler(org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CustomApiResponse<?>> handlerDataViolation(org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException dataIntegrityViolationException, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest)
      Handles data integrity violation exceptions.

      These exceptions occur when database constraints are violated, such as unique constraint violations or foreign key constraints.

      Parameters:
      dataIntegrityViolationException - the data integrity violation exception
      httpServletRequest - the HTTP request that triggered the exception
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the error response with HTTP 409 status
